vehicles.description: A yellow excavator on a trailer being towed by a white truck parked on the right side of the road
vehicles.explanation: The parked vehicles occupy part of the road reducing the available driving space and may potentially move, requiring the ego car to be cautious and ready to react.

traffic signs.description: Directional signs on the right side of the road
traffic signs.explanation: The signs may indicate upcoming changes in road layout or directions, and the ego car should be prepared to follow new road paths or make turns as indicated.

traffic cones.description: Orange traffic cones placed in front of the parked truck and excavator, closing off a section of the right lane
traffic cones.explanation: The cones indicate a construction zone or an obstruction, signaling the ego car to merge left and avoid the closed section of the road.

general_perception.description and explanation:
The traffic image displays a yellow excavator on a trailer being towed by a white truck parked on the right side of the road. These parked vehicles occupy part of the road, reducing the available driving space and potentially moving, which requires the ego car to be cautious and ready to react.

Additionally, there are directional signs on the right side of the road. These signs may indicate upcoming changes in the road layout or directions, and the ego car should be prepared to follow new road paths or make necessary turns as indicated.

Orange traffic cones are placed in front of the parked truck and excavator, closing off a section of the right lane. These cones signal a construction zone or an obstruction, informing the ego car to merge left and avoid the closed road section.

1.description and explanation: This object is a truck equipped with a construction crane. The involvement of specialized machinery such as this crane indicates active construction or maintenance work likely occurring near or on the road. This scenario should prompt the ego car to exercise increased caution, potentially reducing speed and maintaining a greater distance from the truck to allow for sudden stops or movements related to ongoing construction activities.

2.description and explanation: This object is categorized as a traffic cone, typically used in road management to signal alterations in regular traffic patterns or to warn drivers of potential hazards ahead, such as construction sites. The presence of traffic cones necessitates the ego car to remain vigilant and possibly prepare for changes in lane formations or closures, adjusting speed accordingly to ensure safety while navigating through or around the indicated area.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should reduce speed and prepare to merge to the left lane, maintaining a safe distance from the parked vehicles and being vigilant for any unexpected movements. Additionally, the car should monitor the directional signs for any required changes in driving path or turns.
